deployment_relevant_files: definition.json (AWS Step Functions state machine definition)
assume_role_policy.json (IAM trust policy for Lambda execution role)
architectural_resources: AWS Lambda function (iterator/dispatcher implemented in main.go)
Target AWS Lambda function invoked asynchronously via AWS SDK (env var LAMBDA)
AWS Step Functions state machine to invoke iterator every 10 seconds (definition.json)
AWS IAM role/trust policy for Lambda (assume_role_policy.json)
AWS S3 bucket/object for build artifact distribution (CircleCI uploads iterator.zip to s3://rockset-public in .circleci/config.yml)
